text: Norman Jason Hewitt was born 11 November, 1968 in Hastings and died 15 July, 2024. He was a New Zealand rugby union player who played 23 games including 9 tests for New Zealand and played for Hawke's Bay, Southland and Wellington rugby. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:2024 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: Norm Hewitt
